::Prowl/Hot Rod/Epyon/Skyburst::

When Nighstrike refused to walk, Hot Rod picked him up by the arms, and
Skyburst got him by the legs. The continued on, carrying him to the
cell.

Prowl looked to Azure.
"We'll have him sedated. I'm sure our medical facilities will have
something to do that. We'll have to keep him in a cell behind a force
field, however. But there is a place you could work on him in there."
Prowl then followed Hot Rod and Skyburst.

Epyon followed also. He wanted to see this through to the end. He still
felt it his fault, that Nighstrike existed. He didn't go after Condor
soon enough.
